website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Sperry Crest Knot features durable hemp upper with breathable linings and Memory Foam insoles that ensure a comfortable fit and feel on foot. Perfect for those with an always-on-the-go lifestyle, this shoe is designed for convenience and comfort without compromising versatility in style.There are a few things to consider, though. The Crest Knot could be stiff in the heel and too tight-fitting for wide-footed wearers.
pros: The budget-friendly price point of the Sperry Crest Knot shoe is an advantage for some buyers
These Sperry low-top sneakers are highly-rated by the majority of reviewers for their overall performance
Some purchasers liked that this Sperry is a cute casual shoe to wear with jeans and shorts
The neutral color of this shoe is attractive, according to a few reviewers
Many reviewers said that this is a comfortable shoe once broken-in
cons: Limited colorways are available for the Sperry Crest Knot
One reviewer’s only complaint is that the elastic strap under the laces gets tight after some time
Many wearers were disappointed with the stiff heel area of this shoe
It rubs against the heel and causes blisters
Another dismayed reviewer reported that her pair started peeling apart within a week of wear

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Super cute color but fits very tight it's definitely not true to size. I would order a 1/2 size up to be on the safe side. I wear a size 7 and have a narrow foot and the shoe was very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes, but I had to return them. The top of the shoe, where the shoe laces would be if this style had them, is actually a good size piece of elastic. This elastic was INCREDIBLY tight. I have very much average size and shaped feet. It was just really uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Smartypants

customer_reviews.title: Sperry's for Women
customer_reviews.text: Love my Sperry's. They fit great and they look great. I will be ordering another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Darling little shoe and there is enough room if I want to wear footies!!
customer_reviews.author: whoozdamama

customer_reviews.title: Super cute summer canvas slide on.
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they do hurt my bunion a bit. Super cute and decent enough support.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Q

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I’ve gotten a lot of compliments. Irritated the back of my ankles after first wear, but then never again! Really pretty light gray with fringe!
customer_reviews.author: MB2015

customer_reviews.title: Slim. Wouldn't size up. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Slim on the sides. My feet are just barely wide and I'll fit them just fine with some no show socks. Purchased on sale $12. Pretty great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Seiberling

customer_reviews.title: TTS and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and true to size. I wear a 6.5, I bought that size. First time I wore them it was all day and I had no problem with comfort. Would buy again. In fact I'm thinking about buying another color.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I sized up half a size from my normally size just because of my prior knowledge of my other Sperry shoes and they fit perfect. Very comfortable casual shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Tuell

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the shoes. Buying more in other colors only maybe a size bigger bc they are very tight in the toes
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quality Of my pair was poor.  Maybe just mine...
customer_reviews.text: Wore 8 times and both shoes came apart in 2 places! Requesting a refund. I really like them too! I might try again if refund comes through...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these as I really needed a 6.5, but they’re cute shoes and would’ve been comfortable in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Kriost

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, but SO SMALL. I'm normally a 5/5.5 so I ordered a size up as suggested, and ordered a size 6. I am never a size 6, but in these, I am at least a 6.5. These shoes are stiff and small, and I'm not sure I'll actually enjoy wearing them...
customer_reviews.author: Kensey Lawhun

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was reluctant on buying shoes on-line, my shoe size varies with the many different styles on the market. Was very pleased with the fit. Love the shoe. Have recently bought two more pair. Shoe does fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The width of these shoes are way too tight. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Coffey

customer_reviews.title: No laces
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not only super comfortable but extremely stylish. I bought 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The right shoe was a lot tighter than the left. Very stiff but after a little walking it was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Emley Navarro

customer_reviews.title: These CAN Be Broken In Comfortably!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute but take quite awhile to break in and probably some sore heels or blisters if you don’t bring a backup pair of shoes with you until they’re well broken in. If you wore them for about 20 min a day you could probably avoid the blisters altogether, just know it will take some time to break them in to where they’re comfortable-but it WILL HAPPEN. Mine are super comfortable now and I love them!! So hang in there, they can be worth it especially if you get them on sale! 😊
customer_reviews.author: RachAch

product_meta.title: Sperry womens Crest Knot Fray Crest Knot Sneaker
product_meta.description: Say you're up for anything, and actually mean it. Thanks to these quick-drying slip-ons, padded with memory foam, the day is wave-ready, adventure-made.
feature_bullets: Slip on sneaker with no-lace design for easy on and off wearing
Moisture-wicking Dri-Lex material keeps feet cool and dry
